tool_description: Constructs citation networks from seed cases, mapping forward and backward citations to identify related precedents and citation patterns.

seed_cases.description: Initial case citations to build network from

network_depth.description: Levels of citation connections to explore (1-4)

citation_direction.description: Direction to trace: forward, backward, bidirectional

minimum_citations.description: Minimum citation count threshold for inclusion (1-100)

max_network_size.description: Maximum number of cases to include in network (50-1000)

error_messages: Invalid seed cases: One or more seed case citations are malformed or inaccessible
Invalid network depth: Set depth between 1 and 4 levels
Invalid citation direction: Use one of [forward, backward, bidirectional]
Invalid minimum citations: Set threshold between 1 and 100
Network size exceeded: Reduce max_network_size or narrow filters to stay within limits
Date range error: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 format
usage: Provide seed_cases array and configure network parameters including depth, direction, and filters. Returns citation network with relationship mappings.

network_cases.description: All cases included in the citation network

citation_relationships.description: Citation connections between cases (citing_case -> cited_case format)

centrality_scores.description: Network centrality scores indicating influence of each case

cluster_groups.description: Identified clusters or groups of related cases

network_statistics.description: Summary statistics about the constructed network
